name: Best Vendor
tag_list: bestvendor, startup-apps, business-apps, best-small-business-software, cloud-based-software, social-media, cloud-apps, startup-hacks, business-toolkit, software-application, software-applications, best-software, best-apps, software-app, software-apps
overview:
BestVendor helps you find the best work apps to get things done. We believe that the right product or hack can transform your work life — and that there’s no better way to find them than through your peers and contacts.

Initially, we’re focusing on software and apps. Longer term, we aim to become the first place you go for reviews and recommendations on any business product or technology. We like to think that we’re reinventing the business directory through social recommendations.
